https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1rUjXLaQ39xzwOirm4cLAdk372T.jpg Loving cult film and idiosyncratic musical portrait of summer festivities in the Catalan village of Crespià, with early performances by the well-known faces from the work of Serra. Crespià, the Film not the Village
